features:
Lightweight aero optimized shorts
Full stretch fabric
Engineered for progressive biking
Durable CORDURA® fabric
Alu hook closure for a perfect fit
Laser cut holes for airflow
Removable inner shorts
2 zipped side pockets
CONSTRUCTION DUROxpand 4-way stretch woven CORDURA® fabric with DRYOzone PFC free DWR
COMPOSITION Main fabric: 64% Polyamide (Cordura), 26% Polyamide, 10% Elastane, Insert 1: 91% Polyester, 9% Elastane
FIT Regular/under knee
